title: SLPP Local Govt Reps in Colombo Today (26)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former Provincial Council Members and Local Government Members of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna have been summoned to Colombo for a meeting at Temple Trees.
Spokesman of the SLPP Sanjeewa Edirimanne stated that they have been summoned for a discussion to be held under the patronage of Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa.
It is reported that the current political situation will be discussed in this discussion.
China to offer another loan to settle existing loans, says Sri Lanka’s Cabinet Spokesperson
